definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The favourable prospecting criteria in this region is gold deposits concentration area near the margin…
sentences.chinese: 本区有利的找矿方向是地台边缘金矿集中区。

sentences.english: Hope I can do a better background next time.
sentences.chinese: 希望下次能造个更佳的地台。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Wah Sing Street and is around the periphery of the formed platforms of the existing buildings.
sentences.chinese: 沿现有樓宇已平整的地台周边而建，可由华星街前往。

sentences.english: It is overlain unconformably by the post Cambrian platform cover.
sentences.chinese: 被后寒武纪地台沉积盖层不整合覆盖。

sentences.english: Dabashan Mountain frontal border is a platform depression on the north verge of Upper Yangzi Platform.
sentences.chinese: 大巴山前缘为上扬子准地台北缘的一个台缘拗陷。

sentences.english: The Honghuagou area of Chifeng City is tectonically located on the northern margin of the Inner Mongolian axis.
sentences.chinese: 其大地构造位置在华北地台北缘内蒙地轴东部。

sentences.english: The deposit is located in the North margin of North-China Platform.
sentences.chinese: 该矿床位于华北地台区北缘内侧。

sentences.english: Saiwusu Gold Deposit belongs to the mineralized area in the north fringe of North China platform.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古赛乌素金矿属华北地台北缘金成矿区域。

sentences.english: The southwestern portion belongs to the north margin of the Sichuan Platform.
sentences.chinese: 西南部隶属四川地台区的北缘。

sentences.english: The degree on geological research is very low in northwest Hetian Area of Tarim Platform.
sentences.chinese: 工作区为地质研究程度很低的塔里木地台和田西北部。

sentences.english: The folded age of the platform cover is considerably late.
sentences.chinese: 地台盖层褶皱时代相当近晚。

sentences.english: The favourable prospecting criteria in this region is gold deposits concentration area near the margin of platform.
sentences.chinese: 本区有利的找矿方向是地台边缘金矿集中区。

sentences.english: Copper deposits in Zhongtiaoshan area of Shanxi are concentrated onthe southern margin of North China Platform.
sentences.chinese: 中条山铜矿集中区位于华北地台南缘。

sentences.english: The Liujiaping complex occurs on the northwest margin of the Yangzi paraplatform.
sentences.chinese: 刘家坪杂岩体出露于扬子准地台西北边缘。

definition: glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
